answers.answer: Hi!I can understand your concerns. You could regulate his diet by making low calorie options for the food he eats and reducing his portion sizes over a period of time. Also, it would make sense to rule out whether he has hypothyroidism or diabetes that could be causing increased weight.  He could take up walking as an exercise—like a trip to his favorite market or park or walk in your garden etc. Hope this helps. Take care!
